title: Tariffs Functioning as a Sort of ‘Deterrent’: Lucier
description: James Lucier, Capital Alpha Partners founding partner, says the Supreme Court may strike down both the China-related national security tariffs and reciprocal tariffs imposed under emergency economic powers. He speaks with Carol Massar on "Bloomberg Markets." (Source: Bloomberg)
